groups.name: spring.python.resolver.javython
groups.description: Configuration properties for the JavythonResolver, which processes PythonArgumentSpec variable expressions embedded within Python scripts.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.javython.regex
properties.description: Regular expression pattern used to locate Javython expressions (e.g. java{...}) within Python scripts.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.javython.position-from-start
properties.description: Number of characters to skip from the start of a matched Javython expression before evaluating it.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.javython.position-from-end
properties.description: Number of characters to skip from the end of a matched Javython expression before evaluation.
